content:

author: eaoe
protolambda
content: <@363955106850275331> I'm not a solidity dev, but iirc, for a nested map the separate keys are hashed together into one. You probably want to join an application-layer focused server for this kind of question. Here we just focus on protocol related things

author: narli14
content:
Hi Everyone,

We're helping developers jump ship into crypto. We've been running courses and have been getting flat 10 NPS over the last two months. These courses are completely asynchronous.By the end of this month, we will cover all the competency path for beginners and intermediate level Ethereum and Solana development.

We're a Y - combinator backed company looking to help as many developers get started with crypto.DM me or join our Discord group to get started! 

Discord group link : https://discord.gg/hjgq5uzJ

Thanks!
